: : Kup/Rodimus Prime : :

Kup pulls into the base, with Blackstorm in the bed. Rodimus was 
right there to meet him.

Rodimus Prime: Kup! You have Nightlight!

Kup: Aye, lad. We'll have to secure in an CR chamber with security 
lcoks on. She'll try to fight when the sedative wears off. Once the 
hell at the Pred base is done, we can work on bringing her back. 
Yggdrasil has the programing he took from you though, so we'll need 
him, or his computer.

Kup transformes and the two Autobots take Blackstorm to a CR, placing 
her inside, and activating security measures. She would not be able 
to get out.

Kup: I have to get back to the battle. Azure snuck into the Predacopn 
base and was preparing to blow it to hell.

Rodimus Prime: I'm coming too. I still have a score to settle with 
Hydras, Flicker, Maxima and all the others that had a hand in doing 
what they did to Nightlight.

The two exit the base, transform, and head for the Predacon base.
